name: Sour Cream Ganache
author: KatieMac
summary: This ganache makes a super easy frosting that is great for when you have leftover sour cream in the fridge and chocolate chips on hand -- delicious over almond flavored cupcakes!
directions: Place the chocolate chips into a glass or metal bowl, and set over the top of a pan of barely simmering water
Stir occasionally until melted and smooth
Remove from the heat and transfer the chocolate to a medium bowl
Add the sour cream and vanilla; beat with an electric mixture until smooth and creamy
If you let it cool down too much it will set up, so frost your cake while it is still liquid, or reheat before using
